entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
